briefdescription.para: Sets the AMD FreeSync™ to enabled or disabled state on a display.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the AMD FreeSync™ to enabled or disabled state on a display.

entry.para: The new AMD FreeSync state. Set true to enable AMD FreeSync. Set false to disable AMD FreeSync.

detaileddescription.para: If the AMD FreeSync enabled status is successfully returned, ADLX_OK is returned. If the AMD FreeSync enabled status is not successfully returned, an error code is returned. Refer to ADLX_RESULT for success codes and error codes.
AMD FreeSync technology synchronizes the refresh rate of a display with the framerate of AMD FreeSync compatible graphics card to deliver dynamic refresh rate.

AMD FreeSync technology reduces or eliminates visual artifacts, input latency, screen tearing and stuttering during gaming and video playback. AMD FreeSync technology can be delivered through DisplayPort and HDMI® connections.
